        <description>Change ml_stopwords name field type from string to translated_field.</description>
        <name>Change ml_stopwords name field type</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[if (!pm.isZboot()) {

    var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
    gr.addQuery("name", "ml_stopwords");
    gr.addQuery("element", "name");
    gr.query();
    if (gr.next()) {
        gr.setValue("internal_type", "translated_field");
        gr.update();
        gs.info("Changed ml_stopwords name field type to translated_field");
    }

}]]></script>
